name: Quiet
overview:
From a low rumble to a triumphant roar, Zi’s seventh album ‘Quiet‘ creates contemplative space to co-exist in a manic chiptune landscape. Slow your breath as you listen to the glittering tinkle of meteors, the crackling of embers, or the gentle fuzz of a misty night.

This album was made with the Famitracker and uses only the original NES chipset.
